statements: DELETE FROM CustomerBehaviorAnalysis WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM customer_behavior WHERE customer_id = 1 AND last_purchase_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM personalized_products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price > 1000;
DELETE FROM customer_behavior WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM personalized_products WHERE category = 'Clothing');
DELETE FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price > 1000.00;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date < '2022-01-01' AND quantity < 5;
DELETE FROM customers WHERE age > 50 AND name LIKE 'J%'
DELETE FROM purchases WHERE quantity < 10 AND purchase_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM Recommendations WHERE customer_id = 5 AND product_id = 10;
